title: Welcome Message
content: Welcome to our API service. This is a sample response to help you get started.

title: Error Handling
content: This response demonstrates how error messages are structured in our API.

title: API Documentation
content: Complete API documentation is available at /docs. Please refer to it for detailed information about each endpoint.

title: User Profile Response
content: User profile information including name, email, and account status.

title: Product Information
content: Detailed product specifications, pricing, and availability information.

title: Updated Welcome Message
content: Welcome to our enhanced API service. This response has been updated with additional information.

title: Revised Error Handling
content: This response now includes additional troubleshooting steps and contact information for support.
